content: 1020 1085 m / 700 775 845 880 960 1000 1080 1120 1190 yds for full length top 965 1085 1165 1225 1345 1400 1520 1580 1670 m / 1055 1185 1275 1340 1470 1533 1664 1728 1823 yds amounts are approximate and include some extra for swatching and margin of error when choosing yarn always make sure to meet gauge with chosen fabric and weight sample used lion brand truboo yarn 3 100% rayon from bamboo 100g / 220m 241yds in the colour slate **hooks ** 4 mm for yoke and 4 5 mm for lace - always use a hook size that will result in the correct gauge after blocking **notions ** tapestry needle 4 stitch markers or scrap strands of yarn to be used as markers scrap yarn or thread for embroidering embroidery needle **gauge** 21 sts x 24 row = 10 x 10 cm worked in single_crochet flat 3 5 cm wide x 4 cm tall = 1 lace repeat x 4 row of lace 1 most dk weight yarn will work but here are some i would recommend that would be a good match based on fiber content and gauge sirdar snuggly baby bamboo dk 80% bamboo 20% wool knit picks galileo 50% merino wool 50% viscose from bamboo lion brand yarn coboo 50% cotton 50% rayon from bamboo 1 www plyful com 2 https //nomadstitches com/blog/2022/08/12/bougainvillea-top-free-pattern 3 https //nomadstitches com/blog/2022/08/12/bougainvillea-top-free-pattern
